mapper.select: select id, uid, user_name,name, phone, id_number, service_status,auth_status, member_card_expire_time,remaining_number,card_type, init_electricity_battery_sn, now_electricity_battery_sn, battery_deposit, usable_status, del_flag, create_time, update_time,mailbox from electricity.t_user_info where id = #{id}

select from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') date, count(*) as totalCount from electricity.t_user_info where create_time >= #{startTimeMilliDay} and create_time <=#{endTimeMilliDay} group by from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') order by from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') desc

select from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') date, count(*) as serviceCount from electricity.t_user_info where create_time >= #{startTimeMilliDay} and create_time <=#{endTimeMilliDay} group by from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') order by from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') desc

select from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') date, count(*) as memberCardCount from electricity.t_user_info where create_time >= #{startTimeMilliDay} and create_time <=#{endTimeMilliDay} and member_card_expire_time is not null and remaining_number is not null group by from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') order by from_unixtime(create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') desc
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_user_info
uid = #{uid},
service_status = #{serviceStatus},
now_electricity_battery_sn = #{nowElectricityBatterySn},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
update electricity.t_user_info set remaining_number=remaining_number-1,update_time = #{updateTime} where del_flag=0 and remaining_number>0 and id = #{id}
update electricity.t_user_info set remaining_number=remaining_number+1,update_time = #{updateTime} where del_flag=0 and id = #{id}

update electricity.t_user_info
service_status = #{serviceStatus},
battery_deposit = #{batteryDeposit}, order_id=#{orderId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
